channel.title: SRL error?
channel.description:
Okay, I'm sick of noobs asking where they can get SRL. Here's a tutorial. First, get WINRAR if you don't already have it. (if you don't know where to get winrar then just go to www.justfuckinggoogleit.com) Then you're going to click on this link:
http://www.sendspace.com/file/y2n8ul (courtesy of Sh4d0ws) using the extract to button on WINRAR extract the SRL folder into C:/Program Files/SCAR 2.03/Includes enjoy! :D
~rab[br][size=1]Posted at: June 05, 2006, 09:11:28 pm[/size][hr]some replies on how this tut worked would be appreciated :)

item.title: SRL error?
item.dc:creator: @rabcarl rabcarl
item.description:
@rabcarl wrote:

Okay, I’m sick of noobs asking where they can get SRL. Here’s a tutorial. First, get WINRAR if you don’t already have it. (if you don’t know where to get winrar then just go to www.justfuckinggoogleit.com)
Then you’re going to click on this link:

http://www.sendspace.com/file/y2n8ul (courtesy of Sh4d0ws)
using the extract to button on WINRAR extract the SRL folder into C:/Program Files/SCAR 2.03/Includes
enjoy!
